title: IDAPython: error executing init.py:
content:
When I open Ida Pro 7.3 I see an error message 

IDAPython: error executing init.py:
nothing to repeat

Refer to the message window to see the full error log.

How can I understand what is the problem? in message windows I not see any problem.

I have python in PATH .and only 1 installation of python

comments.text: Have u found the answer yet ?
Can you provide the init.py ? Does this error come from any extension?
If it is the init.py in [IDA_DIRECTORY]/python/[2 or 3]/init.py , then maybe your IDA installation is broken

answers_data.content: Read READMY_python3.txt in the folder where IDA is installed. For example, in my case on Windows, running idapyswitch.exe and selecting one of the installed Python distributions helped.
